metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000203 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
ROOT version 6.9.03 and below is vulnerable to an authenticated shellmetacharacter injection in the rootd daemon resulting in remote codeexecution

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000203` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libroot-bindings-python5.34 - 5.34.30-0ubuntu8+esm1
libroot-bindings-ruby5.34 - 5.34.30-0ubuntu8+esm1
libroot-core5.34 - 5.34.30-0ubuntu8+esm1

criterions.comment: root-system package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.34.30-0ubuntu8+esm1').
